title: fix: add audio models to API key permissions UI
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Added audio models to the API key permissions selector, enabling granular access control for audio services.
gist.impact: Users can now create API keys specifically restricted to audio models like ElevenLabs and Whisper.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee organizing golden API keys, attaching specific musical note tags to some of them to represent the new audio permissions.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee organizing golden API keys on a wooden desk, attaching small musical note tags to specific keys. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Represents audio model permissions. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee organizing golden API keys on a wooden desk, attaching small musical note tags to specific keys.
